greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n^2 / (squarefree kernel of n).
comment: a(n)=n iff n is squarefree: a(A005117(n))=A005117(n).
Index of first occurrence of n in A019554. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Nov 17 2006
link: Michel Marcus, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^{2e-1}. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Nov 17 2006
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(f=factor(n)); for (k=1, #f~, f[k,2] = 2*f[k,2]-1); factorback(f); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 20 2017
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 25 2005
